isis.stitle: ELECTRICAL SYSTEM TROUBLESHOOTING GUIDE / 9200 9300 9400 MODELS BUILT AFTER JANUARY 1, 1995 - INSTRUMENTS (New Data Link Driven Instrument Cluster) - OPERATION - WATER TEMPERATURE GAUGE

svcproc.title: WATER TEMPERATURE GAUGE
svcproc.para: The engine water temperature is measured by an electrical sending unit and is fed to the engine ECM. The ECM converts the electrical voltage into a data signal, and transfers it over the data link to the instrument cluster's microprocessor. The instrument cluster's processor then drives the water temperature display gauge.
